discovery.title: Discover San Luis de Gaceno
discovery.subtitle: golden gateway to the Casanarean plains
discovery.paragraphUno: San Luis de Gaceno is a municipality located in the southeastern part of Boyacá, in the Neira province. Known as
discovery.paragraphDos: , it features a blend of Llanero and Boyacense culture, earning the nickname “The land of pija-sumercé” from locals and visitors alike in honor of its cultural heritage. With a warm climate averaging 28°C and an elevation of approximately 400 meters above sea level, this town serves as a refuge for hundreds of species of birds, plants, amphibians, reptiles, and mammals that enrich the biodiversity of the eastern foothills.
discovery.comillas: “The golden gateway to the Casanarean plains”
discovery.paragraphTres: This municipality has a number of attractions that make it a perfect destination for nature and adventure tourism. Currently, many of its residents are working to reactivate the tourism sector and provide better service to visitors.

where.title: Select
where.subtitle: A town center and learn more about its tourism offerings
where.subtitle_2: Five unique ways to experience the soul of Boyacá

guamal.title: Guamal Town Center
guamal.info: Surrounded by mountains and rural paths, Guamal is ideal for hiking lovers, birdwatchers, and water sports enthusiasts. Here, adventure tourism comes alive among pools, rivers, and hidden trails.

teresa.title: Santa Teresa Town Center
teresa.info: Santa Teresa is perfect for disconnecting and reconnecting. Its natural surroundings, warm people, and tranquility make it ideal for gentle walks, retreats, or cultural activities.

Horizontes.title: Horizontes Town Center
Horizontes.info: True to its name, Horizontes offers open landscapes and privileged views. It's the perfect place to relax, take panoramic photos, or start routes to other centers.

LaMesa.title: La Mesa Town Center
LaMesa.info: La Mesa offers authentic rural experiences, from coffee farm tours to local cooking workshops. Here, the land is felt and savored.

SanCarlos.title: San Carlos del Guavio Town Center
SanCarlos.description: Cultural and festive heart of the municipality.
SanCarlos.info: As the administrative and social hub, this is where history, music, dance, and vibrant traditions come together. It’s the meeting point for major festivals and markets.

terms.titleMain: Terms and Conditions of Use – “Gaceno Inspira Platform”

section_1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section_1.paragraph: By accessing, browsing, or registering on the Gaceno Inspira tourism platform, the user agrees to fully comply with these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must refrain from using the platform.

section_2.title: 2. Purpose of the Platform
section_2.paragraph: Gaceno Inspira is a digital portal with an informative, promotional, and interactive nature, whose objective is to facilitate access to tourist information about San Luis de Gaceno, including attractions, activities, businesses, and events in the municipality. The platform allows users to register, create accounts, leave reviews, save favorites, and plan tourist visits.

section_3.title: 3. User Registration
section_3.paragraphs: To access certain features (create reviews, favorites, plans), the user must register by providing truthful and complete information. The user agrees to:
items: Keep their password confidential.
Not impersonate others.
Not use false or misleading data.
Be responsible for all activity performed from their account.
section_3.paragraphs_2: The platform administration may suspend or cancel accounts that violate these terms.

section_4.title: 4. Proper Use of the Platform
section_4.paragraphs: The user agrees to use the platform in accordance with the law, moral standards, public order, and these terms, refraining from:
items: Publishing offensive, false, defamatory, or discriminatory content.
Using the platform for illegal or fraudulent purposes.
Affecting the site's operation or security through any type of cyber attack.
Promoting activities or products unrelated to tourism in San Luis de Gaceno without express authorization.

section_5.title: 5. User-Generated Content
section_5.paragraphs: Users can create content within the platform (reviews, comments, travel plans). Such content:
items: Must be truthful, respectful, and aligned with the platform's tourism purpose.
May be moderated, edited, or removed by the administrator if it violates the rules.
Does not necessarily represent the opinion of the Mayor's Office of San Luis de Gaceno.

section_6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
paragraphs: All institutional content (texts, maps, graphic design, 'Gaceno Inspira' brand, etc.) is the property of the Mayor’s Office of San Luis de Gaceno or is licensed for use. Reproduction, distribution, or modification without prior written authorization is prohibited.
Users retain ownership of their own comments or reviews, but by publishing them, they grant the platform a non-exclusive, free, and transferable license for promotional tourism purposes.

section_7.title: 7. Third-Party Links
section_7.paragraphs: The platform may contain links to sites or services offered by third parties (accommodations, restaurants, tour guides, etc.). These services are not operated or controlled by the Mayor’s Office. Therefore, no responsibility is assumed for:
items: Content, availability, or accuracy of the information on those sites.
Quality of the products or services offered by third parties.

section_8.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
paragraphs: The Gaceno Inspira platform is provided 'as is.' No guarantee is made regarding the absence of technical errors or continuous service availability.
The Mayor’s Office will not be responsible for:
items: Loss of information due to system failures.
Damages caused by misuse of the platform.
Consequences arising from interaction with third parties featured on the site.

section_9.title: 9. Modifications
section_9.paragraphs: These Terms may be modified at any time. Registered users will be notified via email and/or a prominent notice on the site. Continued use of the platform after the modification implies acceptance of the new terms.

section_10.title: 10. Applicable Law and Jurisdiction
section_10.paragraphs: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Colombia. In case of dispute, the parties submit to the competent judges of the municipality of San Luis de Gaceno, Boyacá.

privacy.responsibility: Data controller responsible for processing personal data
privacy.name: Name

section_1.title: 1. Purpose
section_1.paragraphs: This Privacy Policy aims to inform users of the Gaceno Inspira tourism platform about the collection, processing, storage, and protection of their personal data, in accordance with Law 1581 of 2012, Decree 1377 of 2013, and other related regulations in Colombia.

section_2.title: 2. What personal data do we collect?
section_2.paragraphs: When interacting with the platform, we may collect the following data:
items: Contact information: full name, email address, phone number (optional)
Profile information: username, encrypted password, tourism interests.
Browsing information: approximate location (if authorized), IP, access device.
User-generated content: reviews, favorites, tourism plans created within the platform.

section_3.title: 3. Purposes of data processing
section_3.paragraphs: The data will be used for the following purposes:
items: Enable the creation and management of personal accounts.
Display personalized information about destinations, activities, or businesses based on interests.
Enable interaction with features such as saving favorites, leaving reviews, or planning visits.
Improve user experience through statistical and functional analysis.
Send promotional or informational communications related to events and local tourism (with prior authorization).
Comply with legal and contractual obligations.

section_4.title: 4. Rights of the data subject
section_4.paragraphs: In accordance with Colombian legislation, users have the right to:
items: Know, update, correct, or delete their personal data.
Request proof of the authorization granted.
Be informed about how their data is used.
Revoke authorization and/or request deletion of their data when constitutional or legal rights are violated.
Access their personal data free of charge.

section_5.title: 5. Security measures
section_5.paragraphs: Gaceno Inspira implements physical, electronic, and administrative security protocols and measures to protect personal data from unauthorized access, loss, alteration, or destruction.

section_6.title: 6. Data transfer and transmission
section_6.paragraphs: We do not share or sell personal data to third parties. Data will only be transferred to public or private entities in case of legal obligation or court order.

section_7.title: 7. Authorization for processing
section_7.paragraphs: By registering on the platform or continuing to browse, the user acknowledges and accepts this policy, and freely, expressly, and informedly authorizes the processing of their personal data according to the purposes described herein.

section_8.title: 8. Validity
section_8.paragraphs: This Policy is effective from its publication. Collected data will be retained for the time necessary to fulfill the mentioned purposes or for the legally required period.
